name: Red Pelican Music
tag_list: guitar-lessons, piano-lessons, drum-lessons, voice-lessons, bass-lessons, banjo-lessons, ukulele-lessons, dobro-lessons, saxophone-lessons, music-software-lessons, songwriting-lessons, film-scoring-lessons, music-lessons
overview:
Red Pelican Music offers the finest private music lessons in Los Angeles.

Our teachers are elite musicians, hand-picked for their enthusiasm and patience. We cater to discerning customers, who appreciate top quality and friendly service.

Students of all ages and skill levels are welcome. Location options include: your home, our studio, or via web-video (Skype).

We offer instruction on a wide variety of instruments - piano, guitar, voice, singing, drums, percussion, bass, banjo, dobro, ukulele, saxophone, and clarinet. In addition, we offer theory, songwriting, composition, film scoring, and music software lessons.

Our teaching approach is comprehensive and directed, customized to the goals and stylistic interests of the student. A typical lesson will involve both technique and a song project - often coming right off the student’s iPod!

Red Pelican Music began with the simple mission of providing world-class music lessons in Los Angeles, CA. We hope you’ll find our customer service exemplary, and our teachers top-notch. We pride ourselves on having not only the most talented, but the nicest people in town. We hope you’ll agree.

Don’t hesitate to give us a call. We’ll be happy to answer any questions and look forward to helping you along your musical journey.

*We offer lessons only. We won’t sell you a guitar, or a drum-set, but are happy to give advice ;-)
